item.title: Show HN：寻找Beta测试器：在Admentsphere Sandbox中运行AI生成的代码
item.description:
嘿，大家我们正在及早访问AdmentPhere，这是一个安全的运行时平台，用于在Cloud Sandbox中执行AI生成的代码。如果您使用llms（chatgpt，claude等）构建，并且希望它们不仅要编写代码，还希望它们实际运行 - 这是给您的。 Each sandbox behaves like a containerized runtime — Think of it as Execution-as-a-Service: no local setup, no config hell — just send a command and it runs securely.--------------------------------------------How AgentSphere Works with MCP Clients?AgentSphere is integrated into the MCP ecosystem and works seamlessly with:- Cursor- Claude代码 - raycast - Gemini Cli - 和更多的MCP客户端... 参考文档：https://www.agentsphere.run/docs/mcp-server--------------------------------------------DemoThe following video clip demonstrates what AgentSphere can help in action.- Web Game Mario: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5mtquzawxoa href =“ https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zxtpoddl_jo” rel =“ nofollow”> https：//www.youtube.com/watch?v= = sxtppoddl_jo 实际执行代码和处理数据 - 使用光标，克劳德代码，射线播放，双子座CLI或类似的MCP客户端，并希望输出“ Just just Run” - 使用自主代理工作流程 - 测试AI生成的代码在安全的，孤立的环境中，请与Agentsphents phane Adentsphere 一起尝试。 Register now and grab your API key in just a few clicks!https://www.agentsphere.run/We're looking for developers, builders, and AI toolmakers to test it out, and tell us what is great and what doesn’t.我们会喜欢您的反馈。有疑问吗？将它们放在下面。谢谢！
注释URL： https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=444527535 点：1 ＃评论：0
